scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performing her song 'Heart Challenger' on stage with dancing and background visuals.
MC segment where Takanashi Kiara speaks to the audience about her performance, the preparation, and her future goals.

subtitles.original: 違う嘘一つで
subtitles.english: With just one different lie

subtitles.original: ハートを虜にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to captivate your heart

subtitles.original: くるくる変えてみても
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I change it

subtitles.original: 髪形が決まらない もう！
subtitles.english: I can't get my hairstyle right. Jeez!

subtitles.original: 告白のシミュレーション
subtitles.english: My confession simulation

subtitles.original: ドキドキ騒ぎ出しちゃう
subtitles.english: My heart starts pounding

subtitles.original: 隙を狙い込めて
subtitles.english: I'll aim for an opening

subtitles.original: 一発勝負！明日は
subtitles.english: And give it my all! I hope tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 絶対に晴れますように
subtitles.english: ...will definitely be a sunny day!

subtitles.original: Woo!
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: I'm here to tell you that I love you through and through
subtitles.english: I'm here to tell you that I love you through and through

subtitles.original: There's no one else in this world that I would trade for you
subtitles.english: There's no one else in this world that I would trade for you

subtitles.original: 燃え袖ギュッと握ったら
subtitles.english: When I tightly grasp my oversized sleeves

subtitles.original: ミッション開始の合図
subtitles.english: It's the signal to start the mission

subtitles.original: カラフルな恋の味
subtitles.english: The colorful taste of love

subtitles.original: 溶けちゃう前にお受け取って Please
subtitles.english: Accept it before it melts, please!

subtitles.original: 鳴り響く鐘の音
subtitles.english: The sound of ringing bells

subtitles.original: 校舎の窓辺で二人
subtitles.english: Just the two of us by the school window

subtitles.original: ねぇ、早く言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Hey, I have to say it soon

subtitles.original: 照れちゃうけど 好きです！
subtitles.english: It's embarrassing, but I love you!

subtitles.original: スペシャル！この想い
subtitles.english: Special! These feelings...

subtitles.original: 君まで届け
subtitles.english: ...reach out to you!

subtitles.original: Whip it! Bang-bang!
subtitles.english: Whip it! Bang-bang!

subtitles.original: Woo! Hey!
subtitles.english: Woo! Hey!

subtitles.original: Say Wow!
subtitles.english: Say Wow!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay yay yay! That was Heart Challenger! Woo!
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay! That was Heart Challenger! Woo!

subtitles.original: Remember, a while ago at Dokomi...
subtitles.english: Remember, a while ago at Dokomi...

subtitles.original: ...where I had backup dancers who were doing the dancing for me?
subtitles.english: ...where I had backup dancers who were doing the dancing for me?

subtitles.original: And now I learned it myself and performed it myself. Yay!
subtitles.english: And now I learned it myself and performed it myself. Yay!

subtitles.original: That was fun. Hope you enjoyed that.
subtitles.english: That was fun. Hope you enjoyed that.

subtitles.original: Well, you know, if you look at the time, you might think, "Oh, it's gonna be over soon."
subtitles.english: Well, you know, if you look at the time, you might think, "Oh, it's gonna be over soon."

subtitles.original: And yeah, there is one more song.
subtitles.english: And yeah, there is one more song.

subtitles.original: But before that, let me say a few words to you guys.
subtitles.english: But before that, let me say a few words to you guys.

subtitles.original: So, yeah, we're getting close to the end...
subtitles.english: So, yeah, we're getting close to the end...

subtitles.original: ...and I wanted to do something like this for a long time, as you probably know.
subtitles.english: ...and I wanted to do something like this for a long time, as you probably know.

subtitles.original: And I wanted to show off my dance moves for so long...
subtitles.english: And I wanted to show off my dance moves for so long...

subtitles.original: ...which is, it's one of my, I guess, most prominent skills.
subtitles.english: ...which is, it's one of my, I guess, most prominent skills.

subtitles.original: And it has been my dream since the start to show it off...
subtitles.english: And it has been my dream since the start to show it off...

subtitles.original: ...to get into this 3D body, finally be free to do whatever I want.
subtitles.english: ...to get into this 3D body, finally be free to do whatever I want.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and today has finally come.
subtitles.english: Yeah, and today has finally come.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys enjoyed it so far. Yeah.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys enjoyed it so far. Yeah.

subtitles.original: I want to definitely say a big thanks to Ame and Ina and Gura for helping so much...
subtitles.english: I want to definitely say a big thanks to Ame and Ina and Gura for helping so much...

subtitles.original: ...with the recording and the setup.
subtitles.english: ...with the recording and the setup.

subtitles.original: You know, Ame basically built a whole studio...
subtitles.english: You know, Ame basically built a whole studio...

subtitles.original: ...for me to record this in...
subtitles.english: ...for me to record this in...

subtitles.original: ...and I really, really, really appreciate that.
subtitles.english: ...and I really, really, really appreciate that.

subtitles.original: And without her, it wouldn't have been possible at all.
subtitles.english: And without her, it wouldn't have been possible at all.

subtitles.original: And also big thanks to Kanauru for putting together all of this into a proper concert...
subtitles.english: And also big thanks to Kanauru for putting together all of this into a proper concert...

subtitles.original: ...and even creating this beautiful stage here.
subtitles.english: ...and even creating this beautiful stage here.

subtitles.original: Wow! Look, isn't it nice? Yeah.
subtitles.english: Wow! Look, isn't it nice? Yeah.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: In the future, I really hope that I can do more like this, more often...
subtitles.english: In the future, I really hope that I can do more like this, more often...

subtitles.original: ...and get more members to join me in 3D...
subtitles.english: ...and get more members to join me in 3D...

subtitles.original: ...if possible, to dance together. Yeah.
subtitles.english: ...if possible, to dance together. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Especially, you know, Myth and Holotori and EN as a whole...
subtitles.english: Especially, you know, Myth and Holotori and EN as a whole...

subtitles.original: ...with all of them I want to dance and, yeah, have fun together.
subtitles.english: ...with all of them I want to dance and, yeah, have fun together.

subtitles.original: And I think we're getting there, slowly but surely.
subtitles.english: And I think we're getting there, slowly but surely.

subtitles.original: By the way, if you missed it, the birthday merchandise was announced...
subtitles.english: By the way, if you missed it, the birthday merchandise was announced...

subtitles.original: ...it was announced in the previous stream...
subtitles.english: ...it was announced in the previous stream...

subtitles.original: ...before this one, the countdown stream...
subtitles.english: ...before this one, the countdown stream...

subtitles.original: ...and it's linked in the description.
subtitles.english: ...and it's linked in the description.

subtitles.original: So please go check it out if you're interested.
subtitles.english: So please go check it out if you're interested.

subtitles.original: And yeah, last but not least, I want to thank KFP.
subtitles.english: And yeah, last but not least, I want to thank KFP.

subtitles.original: You know how much I appreciate your support...
subtitles.english: You know how much I appreciate your support...

subtitles.original: ...and you believing in me and trusting in me means the world to me.
subtitles.english: ...and you believing in me and trusting in me means the world to me.

subtitles.original: So thank you for giving me the strength...
subtitles.english: So thank you for giving me the strength...

subtitles.original: ...in a very, very, very stressful period leading up to this day.
subtitles.english: ...in a very, very, very stressful period leading up to this day.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think it was worth it. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think it was worth it. Yeah.

subtitles.original: So thank you for waiting for me.
subtitles.english: So thank you for waiting for me.

subtitles.original: And I will continue working hard...
subtitles.english: And I will continue working hard...

subtitles.original: ...to give back to you as much as I can.
subtitles.english: ...to give back to you as much as I can.

subtitles.original: Please continue supporting me...
subtitles.english: Please continue supporting me...

subtitles.original: ...and watch me grow into a bigger, bigger, bigger, bigger Phoenix!
subtitles.english: ...and watch me grow into a bigger, bigger, bigger, bigger Phoenix!
